meanings.definition: A person who moves from the country where he or she was born to another country.
examples: My parents are immigrants from Guatemala.

images.alt: Photo of a group of people sitting in rows in front of American flags.
images.description: Group of people sitting in rows in front of American flags.
images.caption: Young immigrants to the U.S.

source.title: Young immigrants line up to apply for deportation reprieve 5
source.author: chicagopublicmedia

meanings.definition: An artist who makes sculptures, statues or other objects by carving, chiseling, or molding.
examples: She is a sculptor that makes carvings out of blocks of marble.

images.alt: Photo of a person creating a sculpture of a woman.
images.description: A person creating a sculpture of a woman.
images.caption: A sculptor shaping clay to create a piece of art.

source.title: Man in Black Crew Neck T-shirt Sitting Beside Man in Black T-shirt
source.author: Mushtaq Hussain

meanings.definition: One of the steps that make up a staircase, or the entire set of steps as a whole.
examples: Be careful on that loose stair.

images.description: A staircase made of many individual stairs.
images.caption: A staircase made of many individual stairs.

source.title: Dark figure in building with red carpet
source.author: Ryutaro Tsukata

meanings.definition: A flat surface used to write words. In ancient times, tablets were made of stone, clay, or wax.
examples: The tablet has the date July 4, 1776 written on it.

images.alt: Photo of a flat stone surface with letters carved into it.
images.description: A flat stone surface with letters carved into it.
images.caption: A tablet with letters carved on it.

meanings.definition: A stick or rod with a burning material on one end that is lit and carried for light.
examples: The Statue of Liberty holds a torch high in the air.

images.alt: Photo of a flame on the end of a stick.
images.description: A flame on the end of a stick.
images.caption: The torch burns brightly in the night.

source.title: Selective Focus Photography of Lighted Lawn Torch
source.author: Batuhan Alper Bilginer
